   <script src="jquery/jquery-2.1.3.min.js"></script>

   <script type="text/javascript">
       var header = $('#header').html();
       if ( window.location.search.match( /print-pdf/gi ) ) {
           $('.slides > section').prepend(header);
       }
       else {
           $('.slides').prepend(header);
       }
   </script>
